High Priestess Levian:
At the foot of the Hill of Winds is a Camp of Orcs Turek. They live there for a long time. All got used to it.
But lately the Orcs started to behave unusually. And this bothers me.
I am afraid they decided to take on Gludin, taking advantage of the difficult situation on the Hill of Winds. If my fears are confirmed, it would be just awful...
Go to the Orc Camp and talk to Pitura. It is all told in detail.
